text: Ojo mardumi Makka dar taaccuʙand, az in ki ʙar marde az xudason vahj kardem, ki mardumro ʙitarson va mu'minonro muƶda deh, ʙa in ki dar nazdi Parvardigorason pojgohi ʙalande dorand? Pas, cun Rasuli Alloh ʙarojason vahji ilohiro tilovat kard, kofiron guftand, ki in Muhammad (sallallohu alajhi va sallam) codugarest oskoro
